items.heading: Student - BSc(Eng) Electrical & Computer Engineering
items.body: Prospective 2022 honours graduate from the University of Cape Town. Appeared on the Dean's List and maintained a 70% cumulative GPA.

items.heading: Co-founder - Neon Solutions (Pty) Ltd.
items.body: Built a technology company that develops custom digital analytics solutions for businesses with an agile development approach. Wrote business proposals, negotiated terms, designed and developed products in a team environment, offered product support and maintenance.

items.heading: Co-founder - Onset Carbon, Inc.
items.body: Founded a company with a mission to make carbon offsetting more accessible and verifiable through the use of blockchain technology. Incorporated a U.S. entity, developed a fully functional minimum viable product, and secured grant funding to support ongoing development and growth.

items.heading: Part-time developer - Glucode (Pty) Ltd.
items.body: Worked remotely with a team implementing designs to build the Club App.

items.heading: Hardware Acceleration of zk-SNARKs
items.body: My undergraduate thesis is about investigating the hardware acceleration of zk-SNARKs using FPGAs.

items.heading: Neon Analytics by Neon Solutions
items.body: LinkedIn marketing analytics platform built in collaboration with Turn Left Media.

items.heading: Synthetic Nouns
items.body: A unique, fully on-chain, freely claimable Noun for every Ethereum address. See [nouns.wtf](https://nouns.wtf) to learn about Nouns.

items.heading: Synthetic Punks
items.body: A unique, fully on-chain CryptoPunk associated with each Ethereum address. Spritesheet with all traits published on-chain in the form of an 8kB spritesheet.

items.heading: Synthetic Loot Viewer
items.body: A visual representation of the Loot bag associated with every Ethereum wallet. Went [viral](https://twitter.com/imTokenOfficial/status/1434083387996721155) [on](https://twitter.com/dhof/status/1433802696734162946) [Twitter](https://twitter.com/stephancill/status/1433800337639489536). Learn more about loot at [lootproject.com](https://lootproject.com).

items.heading: Ethereum Friend Directory
items.body: A portable list of mutuals for the decentralized web. Lets you build connections with other ethereum accounts on-chain.

items.heading: ForwardMail
items.body: A simple proxy for your email address which creates aliases which can be easily disconnected to prevent unwanted email spam.

items.heading: MovieCheck
items.body: Your personal entertainment portfolio. Easily track and review movies you’ve seen and want to see.

items.heading: Cell TraQ
items.body: Thermal camera system that monitors temperatures at electrochemical plants to improve efficiency • MasQ Brands

items.heading: Simple Learning Time
items.body: Simple Learning Time was built as a replacement for an app that was used at Parklands College to teach junior learners how to tell time. It is used in multiple schools across South Africa and several other countries.

items.heading: 3x Apple WWDC Scholar
items.body: Invited to attend the World Wide Developers Conference in California through Apple's Scholarship programme on three occasions.

items.heading: WRO 2017 Advanced Robotics Challenge Internationals
items.body: Team Infinity placed 9th out of 25 teams in the Advanced Robotics Challenge at the World Robot Olympiad in Costa Rica. The challenge was to build a robot that plays a tetris-like game where it has to pick up randomly selected tetracubes and place them in an upright frame to form rows to score points.
